transArray.content:
🔔Service: I went there quite late, it was already midnight. The lady at the front desk is very patient and has a good attitude.
🚗 Transportation: Very close to Suzhouqiao Subway Station
🧹Hygiene: The room is clean, comfortable and tidy
🍃Environment: Convenient parking

Thanks for the review guys! The simple words all reveal infinite sincerity. Xiao Ji is deeply moved and will definitely live up to your trust. Keep working hard and keep doing it! We look forward to your visit every time~ I wish you a happy life every day!
